page.title: 08EDUCATION IN TIMSBURY
page.content:
In our survey we interviewed seventy -five people and all of them had been to school.Most people went to secondary school and primary school, and some people went to junior school and infant school separately.Only one person went to a middle school. Most people wore school uniform. The most popular age for starting school was at five,and only two people started at six.The majority finished school at fifteen.Only one finished school at twelve.This was an old person.A lot of people didn't have further education, but twenty-six people did. Most liked school but eight people didn't like it ever.
{ By Vanessa,Emma,Rebecca and Ceri.
